channel.title: Prefect on Sarthak Jariwala
channel.description: Recent content in Prefect on Sarthak Jariwala

item.title: Dask Executor in Prefect
item.description: Preliminaries from prefect.executors import LocalDaskExecutor, DaskExecutor from prefect import task, Flow from typing import Iterable Create a Prefect Task # create sample prefect task to run in a flow @task def add(list_of_int: Iterable[int]): return list_of_int[0] + list_of_int[1] Create a Prefect Flow # list of integers to add list_of_ints = [[1, 2], [-3, 5], [4, 5], [9, 0], [3, -8]] # create prefect Flow to run with Dask Executors with Flow("sample-flow") as flow: result = add.
